Class UserConfigurer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.nengo.ui.configurable.managers.ConfigManager
      • ca.nengo.ui.configurable.managers.UserConfigurer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    UserTemplateConfigurer

    public class UserConfigurer
extends ConfigManager
    Configuration Manager which creates a dialog and let's the user enter parameters to used for configuration
